TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdatePanelDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about this class, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.

Docs.related: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

public: UpdatePanelDesigner();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

Docs.param: The control designer regions for the associated control.
Docs.summary: Returns the HTML markup that is used to display the control, and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
Docs.returns: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.

Docs.summary: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the control.
Docs.returns: A serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool UsePreviewControl { get; }

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy of the control to generate the design-time markup, instead of using the actual control that is associated with the designer.
